articles.author: NCAA.com
articles.title: Indiana defeats Miami to win the College Football Playoff National Championship Game - NCAA.com
articles.description: Here's everything you need to know for Indiana against Miami (Fla.) in the College Football Playoff National Championship Game on Monday night.
articles.content: The Indiana Hoosiers are the college football national champions for the first time ever. Top-seeded Indiana defeated No. 10 Miami (Fla.) in the 2025-26 College Football Playoff National Championship… [+3373 chars]
